nodes.documentation:
@author Karen Suen
@notice Stores and manages the state of all listings in the marketplace.
This is a low level storage contract that provides getters and setters for
creating, accessing and modifying listings. Currently, a reference is stored
for fetching the listing image from a distributed database due to the expensive
cost of storing large data on the blockchain. For optimisation reasons,
business logic should be implemented in the client application.
nodes.name: MarketStore

nodes.documentation: @notice Constructor initialises marketplace with no listings

nodes.name: createListingInStore

nodes.documentation:
@dev Disable the given listing by updating its status to INACTIVE
@param _id The id of listing to disable
nodes.name: disableListing

nodes.documentation:
@dev Updates the given listing to SOLD status
@param _id The id of sold listing
nodes.name: listingSold

nodes.documentation:
@dev Updates the given listing to AVAILABLE status
@param _id The id of listing to make available in marketplace
nodes.name: listingAvailable
getListing
getAllSellerListings
getListingPrice
getListingTitle
getListingDescription
getListingImage
getListingSeller
getListingState

@notice Stores and manages the state of all listings in the marketplace.
This is a low level storage contract that provides getters and setters for
creating, accessing and modifying listings. Currently, a reference is stored
for fetching the listing image from a distributed database due to the expensive
cost of storing large data on the blockchain. For optimisation reasons,
business logic should be implemented in the client application.
nodes.name: MarketStore

nodes.documentation: @notice Constructor initialises marketplace with no listings

nodes.name: createListingInStore

nodes.documentation:
@dev Disable the given listing by updating its status to INACTIVE
@param _id The id of listing to disable
nodes.name: disableListing

nodes.documentation:
@dev Updates the given listing to SOLD status
@param _id The id of sold listing
nodes.name: listingSold

nodes.documentation:
@dev Updates the given listing to AVAILABLE status
@param _id The id of listing to make available in marketplace
nodes.name: listingAvailable
getListing
getAllSellerListings
getListingPrice
getListingTitle
getListingDescription
getListingImage
getListingSeller
getListingState

createListingInStore(uint256,string,stri.details: Create a new listing in the marketplace and returns its generated id. Indexing of listings always starts at 1. The unique ID of each listing is auto generated using the incremented total listing count. The list of seller's owned listings are also updated.

params._desc: The reference hash of listing description stored in a distributed database
params._image: The reference hash of listing image stored in a distributed database
params._price: The selling price of the new listing in Wei
params._seller: The seller address that created this listing (owner)
params._title: The title of the new listing

createListingInStore(uint256,string,stri.return: Generated id of listing in the marketplace

disableListing(uint256).details: Disable the given listing by updating its status to INACTIVE

params._id: The id of listing to disable

getAllSellerListings(address).details: Returns a list of all listing id's created by an address (user)

params._seller: The address to retrieve all listing ids for

getListing(uint256).details: The listing state enum value is returned as an integer

params._id: The id of listing to return

getListing(uint256).return: Listing id, price in Wei, title, description, image reference, seller address

getListingDescription(uint256).details: Returns the description reference of a given listing

params._id: The id of listing to retrieve the description of

getListingImage(uint256).details: Returns the image reference of a given listing

params._id: The id of listing to retrieve the image reference of

getListingPrice(uint256).details: Returns the selling price of a given listing in Wei (smallest denomination of Ether)

params._id: The id of listing to retrieve selling price of

getListingSeller(uint256).details: Returns the seller of the listing

params._id: The id of listing to retrieve the state of

getListingState(uint256).details: Returns the current state of a listing as an integer

params._id: The id of listing to retrieve the state of

getListingTitle(uint256).details: Returns the title of a given listing

params._id: The id of listing to retrieve title of

listingAvailable(uint256).details: Updates the given listing to AVAILABLE status

params._id: The id of listing to make available in marketplace

listingSold(uint256).details: Updates the given listing to SOLD status

methods.constructor: Constructor initialises marketplace with no listings

getListing(uint256).notice: Returns all information about a listing in the marketplace as a tuple

userdoc.notice: Stores and manages the state of all listings in the marketplace. This is a low level storage contract that provides getters and setters for creating, accessing and modifying listings. Currently, a reference is stored for fetching the listing image from a distributed database due to the expensive cost of storing large data on the blockchain. For optimisation reasons, business logic should be implemented in the client application.
